name: print
documentation: Prints one or more values to the console.

name: pairs
documentation: Iterates over key-value pairs in a table.

name: ipairs
documentation: Iterates over integer-indexed values in a table.

name: assert
documentation: Raises an error if a condition is false; otherwise returns the given values.

name: type
documentation: Returns the type of a given value as a string.

name: tonumber
documentation: Converts a value to a number, if possible.

name: tostring
documentation: Converts a value to a string.

name: load
documentation: Loads a Lua chunk (code) from a string or function.

name: loadfile
documentation: Loads a Lua chunk from a file.

name: require
documentation: Loads and returns a module, ensuring it is only loaded once.
